```{r }
  if(!exists('run_go_enrich')) devtools::load_all('fast/groups/ag_ohler/work/dharnet_m/cortexomics/pipeline/rseq/')
  modeldir <- 'fast/groups/ag_ohler/work/dharnet_m/cortexomics/pipeline/xtail/xtail_P0_GO'%T>%dir.create(showWarn=F)
  rmdfold <- 'fast/groups/ag_ohler/work/dharnet_m/cortexomics/pipeline/rseq/inst/rmd/de/'
  entreztbl <- read_tsv('fast/groups/ag_ohler/work/dharnet_m/cortexomics/pipeline/my_gencode.vM12.metadata.EntrezGene.tsv')
  gtrmap <-'fast/groups/ag_ohler/work/dharnet_m/cortexomics/pipeline/gene_transcript_map.tsv' %>% fread(header=F) %>% set_colnames(c('gene_id','transcript_id'))
  defile <- 'fast/groups/ag_ohler/work/dharnet_m/cortexomics/pipeline/xtail/xtail_P0.txt'
  my_org_eg_db <- 'org.Mm.eg'
  my_contrast_name <- basename(defile)
  defile <- fread(defile)
  
  traceback()

  entrezgenetable<-entreztbl%>%left_join(gtrmap,by=c('ensembl_transcript_id'='transcript_id'))%>%distinct(gene_id,entrez_gene_id)

  defile%<>%filter(!str_detect(feature_id,'uORF_'))

  defile <- defile%>%left_join(entrezgenetable,by=c('feature_id'='gene_id'))%>%distinct(feature_id,.keep_all=T)%>%filter(!is.na(entrez_gene_id))

  entrez_sig_vec <- setNames(factor(as.numeric(defile$adj_p_value < 0.05)),defile$entrez_gene_id)
  entrez_sig_vec %<>% .[!is.na(.)]
  entrez_sig_vec %<>% .[!is.na(names(.))]
  entrez_sig_vec%>%table

```
